name: Find Fakes
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys to move. X to jump.

Rules:

Look for artefacts that are fake and destroy them, however if you destroy a real artefact, you will be deducted points.

Behind the Scenes:

This is a game I made in Pico  8 in one week for the Brackey's Game jam 2022.2

Credits:

Me (Oliver)
